page.title: 20This Work
page.content:
This work was carried out by{Pear Tree {Junior School, Derby.}This school is an inner-city school. We wanted to study a rural area rather than our own. The work was mostly extra-curricular. These kids took part:-
Rashpall Bola Charanjit Sangha Bhawandeep Hans Jaswinder Chhoker Kulbir Johal Narinder Jagait Xuan Long Sumita Bhola Talvinder Shanker Kuldip Dhanoya Sanjeev Siniara Sukhjinder Dhille Boys Girls
It was GREAT!
Mrs Slater lent her camera. Mr Holmes drove his car. {Wow!
15th July 1985.
